name: Gun Bee
description:
This game was mostly made during Quratine for fun. Just decided to polish it up a little bit and upload it.  This is the first game I'm uploading.  Please have fun and leave your suggestions in the comments. 

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Space: Shoot
ESC: Pause

Art is by Sheabryd and LittlestJewel
I did all the programming
